mistral:7b-instruct: This ahm (by Medibank) HMO plan fits your profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and telemedicine services - all essential for managing complex health conditions like hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and ischemic stroke. Additionally, the plan's affordable monthly premium of $260 aligns well with your upper-middle income bracket, ensuring financial accessibility for the required healthcare coverage.
